# The `SPSSequence` Class Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

SPS tag type for sequences. <a href="#details">More...</a>

class llvm::orc::shared::SPSSequence&lt;SPSElementTagT&gt;</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

SPS tag type for sequences.

SPSSequences should be serialized as a uint64&#95;t sequence length, followed by the serialization of each of the elements.

Definition at line 214 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/shared/simplepackedserialization-h">SimplePackedSerialization.h</a>.
